argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lshpat.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lshpat.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) |
| 3 |  | ishpat.h | |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lshpat.a | |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) |
| 5 |  | lshpat.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) |
| 6 |  | lshpat.l | |- ( ph -> U e. H ) |
| 7 |  | lshpat.q | |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) |
| 8 |  | lshpat.r | |- ( ph -> R e. A ) |
| 9 |  | lshpat.n | |- ( ph -> Q =/= R ) |
| 10 |  | lshpat.m | |- ( ph -> -. Q C_ U ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( <oL ` W ) = ( <oL ` W ) |
| 13 | 11, 1, 3, 12, 5 | #P_islshpcv | |- ( ph -> ( U e. H <-> ( U e. S /\ U ( <oL ` W ) ( Base ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 13 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( U e. S /\ U ( <oL ` W ) ( Base ` W ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
| 16 | 14 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> U ( <oL ` W ) ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 1, 2, 4, 12, 5, 15, 7, 8, 9, 16, 10 | #P_l1cvat | |- ( ph -> ( ( Q .(+) R ) i^i U ) e. A ) |
